results.title: The Swan
results.creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Dore Schary and Charles Vidor
results.brief_description: Days after the release of “The Swan”, Grace Kelly became a real Princess by marrying Prince Rainer of Monaco. In this film, she is a Eurpoean Princess destined to marry the Crown Prince (Alec Guinness). Princess Alexandra is more interested in studying astronomy with her tutor than marriage plans, yet once she sees the Prince, it is love at first sight. Capturing his attention, let alone his affections, proves difficult, until Princess Beatrix, Alex’s mother, connives a scheme to make the Prince jealous. Co-starring Louis Jourdan, Agnes Moorehead, Jessie Royce Landis and Leo G. Carroll.

results.title: The Sunshine boys
results.creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Ray Stark and Herbert Ross
results.brief_description: Adapted from the play by Neil Simon, this film version stars two great actors, Walter Matthau and George Burns, as the two cantankerous old-time vaudevillians who have been persuaded to reunite one more time for a television special, despite the fact that they hate each other. Also stars Richard Benjamin.

results.title: The Sum of all fears
results.creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, MFP Munich Film Partners GmbH, AZL Productions KG, Mace Neufeld and Phil Alden Robinson
results.brief_description: Based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy with screenplay by Paul Attanasia and Daniel Pyne, this political thriller revives the tensions and paranoia of the Cold War era between the Americans and the Russians when the CIA suspect that Russia is once again involved in the development of nuclear weapons. Suspense and intrigue follow as a terrorist plot brings the two super-powers to the brink of nuclear war. Starring Ben Affleck as the rather young CIA agent Jack Ryan and Morgan Freeman as CIA Director William Cabot with James Cromwell, Liev Schreiber, Bridget Moynahan, Alan Bates.

results.title: The Stunt man
results.creator_credit: Melvin Simon Productions and Richard Rush
results.brief_description: A mysterious fugitive escapes from the law and ends up becoming a stunt man under a mesmerizing, possibly insane movie director (Peter O’Toole). Explores the ever changing nature of reality and illusion. Cast also includes Steve Railsback, Barbara Hershey.

results.title: The Stranger
results.brief_description: An escaped Nazi criminal marries an American woman and settles in a Connecticut village. A highly convincing melodrama - enhanced by directorial touches, splendid photography and no-holds barred climax, involving a church clock.

results.title: The Strange love of Martha Ivers
results.creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, Hal B Wallis and Lewis Milestone
results.brief_description: Kirk Douglas made his film debut and Barbara Stanwyck starred as the malevolent Martha Ivers in this melodrama cum thriller which engages the viewer until its gripping climax. A strong supporting cast includes Lizabeth Scott, Van Heflin and Judith Anderson. Martha Ivers is a wicked but powerful woman who runs the town of Iverson after inheriting the family fortune. However, Martha has a deadly secret which threatens to ruin her life. As a teenager, Martha was responsible for the murder of her domineering Aunt so she could elope with her lover and the past has a way of catching up her despite her efforts to keep it buried.

results.title: The Straight story
results.creator_credit: Studio Canal+, FilmFour, Picture Factory, Mary Sweeney, Neal Edelstein and David Lynch
results.brief_description: Richard Farnsworth is Alvin, a poor World War II veteran who, when hearing his estranged brother has suffered a stroke, decides to travel across the American mid-West to visit him. Alvin is a reformed alcoholic who feels heavily the guilt of what his alcoholism cost his wife and family. A magical road movie about human failure and human community, “The Straight Story” sees David Lynch forgo his usually dark and perverse examination of the libido and repression to instead concentrate on a story about human compassion and forgiveness. Lynch’s remarkably restrained direction allows the dignity of the story to come through without sliding into sentimentality. In this he his assisted by an excellent production staff that includes cinematographer Freddie Francis, production designer Jack Fisk, and editor Mary Sweeney. In “The Straight Story”, Lynch celebrates the rugged individualism of traditional rural American heroes, as represented by Western icon Farnsworth, but subversively suggests that this individualism must be tempered by the communal strengths of family, community and friendship. It may be a symptom of the degeneration of such values in contemporary Hollywood that Lynch had to rely on French and English money to finance this gentle and poetic road movie. Also features Harry Dean Stanton, and Sissy Spacek in a moving performance as Alvin’s daughter. Music by long term Lynch collaborator Angelo Badalamenti.

results.title: The Story of Seabiscuit = Pride of Kentucky
results.creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures, William Jacobs and David Butler
results.brief_description: Irishman Shawn O’Hara (Barry Fitzgerald), a horse trainer with the gift of being able to tell whether a yearling is going to be a winner or not, arrives in Paris, Kentucky, with his niece, Margaret (Shirley Temple) to take up a position at Millford Farms. He is drawn to a horse called Seabiscuit which initially no-one else credits with winning. At the same time a romance slowly blossoms between his niece and jockey Ted Knowles (Lon McCallister). Margaret is reticent at falling in love with a jockey however as she has already lost her brother, also a jockey, when he fell to his death while riding one of Shawn’s horses. The incident caused uncle and niece to flee their native Ireland. Written by John Taintor Foote. Music by David Buttolph. Filmed in Technicolor.

results.title: The Storm riders = Fung Wan: Hungba Tinha
results.creator_credit: Golden Harvest, Centro Digital, Li Zhu An, Manfred Wong and Andrew Lau
results.brief_description: A martial arts fantasy film adapted from the long-running manga comic. The Lord Conqueror orphans two children, Wind and Cloud, then brings them up as his disciples. Ten years later the two are set against each other as they rival for the affections of Charity, the Lord Conqueror’s daughter. In Cantonese with English subtitles. Cast includes: Aaron Kwok, Ekin Cheng, Sonny Chiba, Kristy Yang and Shu Oi.

results.title: The Stolen children = Il Ladro di bambini
results.creator_credit: Erre Produzioni, Alia Film, Raidue, Angelo Rizzoli and Gianni Amelio
results.brief_description: Two children, Rosetta and Giusseppe are victims of a child prostitution ring. After their mother is arrested, they are taken by Antonio the Carabiniere from the North to the South of Italy, looking for an orphanage that will take the children. The children have learned to trust no-one, not even each other, yet this journey with Antonio begins to break down the barriers that the children have always had to maintain. This very special, rewarding film was the winner of the Grand Jury Prize at the 1992 Cannes Film Festival and has been universally hailed as one of the finest Italian films released in many years. Stars Enrico Lo Verso, Valentina Scalici and Giuseppe Ieracitano.
